description:
SHACL Shapes Constraint Language is a language for validating RDF graphs against a set of conditions.  These conditions are provided as shapes and other constructs expressed in the form of an RDF graph.  RDF graphs that are used in this manner are called “shapes graphs” in SHACL and the RDF graphs that are validated against a shapes graph are called “data graphs”.  As SHACL shape graphs are used to validate that data graphs satisfy a set of conditions they can also be viewed as a description of the data graphs that do satisfy these conditions.  Such descriptions may be used for a variety of purposes beside validation, including user interface building, code generation and data integration.

Version: 1.0.0

AbstractResult.label: Abstract result
AbstractResult.description: The base class of validation results, typically not instantiated directly.

AndConstraintComponent.label: And constraint component
AndConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to test whether a value node conforms to all members of a provided list of shapes.

BlankNode.label: Blank node
BlankNode.description: The node kind of all blank nodes.

BlankNodeOrIRI.label: Blank node or IRI
BlankNodeOrIRI.description: The node kind of all blank nodes or IRIs.

BlankNodeOrLiteral.label: Blank node or literal
BlankNodeOrLiteral.description: The node kind of all blank nodes or literals.

ClassConstraintComponent.label: Class constraint component
ClassConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to verify that each value node is an instance of a given type.

ClosedConstraintComponent.label: Closed constraint component
ClosedConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to indicate that focus nodes must only have values for those properties that have been explicitly enumerated via sh:property/sh:path.

DatatypeConstraintComponent.label: Datatype constraint component
DatatypeConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to restrict the datatype of all value nodes.

DisjointConstraintComponent.label: Disjoint constraint component
DisjointConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to verify that the set of value nodes is disjoint with the the set of nodes that have the focus node as subject and the value of a given property as predicate.

EqualsConstraintComponent.label: Equals constraint component
EqualsConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to verify that the set of value nodes is equal to the set of nodes that have the focus node as subject and the value of a given property as predicate.

ExpressionConstraintComponent.label: Expression constraint component
ExpressionConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to verify that a given node expression produces true for all value nodes.

HasValueConstraintComponent.label: Has-value constraint component
HasValueConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to verify that one of the value nodes is a given RDF node.

IRI.label: IRI
IRI.description: The node kind of all IRIs.

IRIOrLiteral.label: IRI or literal
IRIOrLiteral.description: The node kind of all IRIs or literals.

InConstraintComponent.label: In constraint component
InConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to exclusively enumerate the permitted value nodes.

Info.label: Info
Info.description: The severity for an informational validation result.

JSConstraint.label: JavaScript-based constraint
JSConstraint.description: The class of constraints backed by a JavaScript function.

JSConstraintComponent.label: JavaScript constraint component
JSConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component with the parameter sh:js linking to a sh:JSConstraint containing a sh:script.

JSExecutable.label: JavaScript executable
JSExecutable.description: Abstract base class of resources that declare an executable JavaScript.

JSFunction.label: JavaScript function
JSFunction.description: The class of SHACL functions that execute a JavaScript function when called.

JSLibrary.label: JavaScript library
JSLibrary.description: Represents a JavaScript library, typically identified by one or more URLs of files to include.

JSRule.label: JavaScript rule
JSRule.description: The class of SHACL rules expressed using JavaScript.

JSTarget.label: JavaScript target
JSTarget.description: The class of targets that are based on JavaScript functions.

JSTargetType.label: JavaScript target type
JSTargetType.description: The (meta) class for parameterizable targets that are based on JavaScript functions.

JSValidator.label: JavaScript validator
JSValidator.description: A SHACL validator based on JavaScript. This can be used to declare SHACL constraint components that perform JavaScript-based validation when used.

LanguageInConstraintComponent.label: Language-in constraint component
LanguageInConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to enumerate language tags that all value nodes must have.

LessThanConstraintComponent.label: Less-than constraint component
LessThanConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to verify that each value node is smaller than all the nodes that have the focus node as subject and the value of a given property as predicate.

LessThanOrEqualsConstraintComponent.label: less-than-or-equals constraint component
LessThanOrEqualsConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to verify that every value node is smaller than all the nodes that have the focus node as subject and the value of a given property as predicate.

Literal.label: Literal
Literal.description: The node kind of all literals.

MaxCountConstraintComponent.label: Max-count constraint component
MaxCountConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to restrict the maximum number of value nodes.

MaxExclusiveConstraintComponent.label: Max-exclusive constraint component
MaxExclusiveConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to restrict the range of value nodes with a maximum exclusive value.

MaxInclusiveConstraintComponent.label: Max-inclusive constraint component
MaxInclusiveConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to restrict the range of value nodes with a maximum inclusive value.

MaxLengthConstraintComponent.label: Max-length constraint component
MaxLengthConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to restrict the maximum string length of value nodes.

MinCountConstraintComponent.label: Min-count constraint component
MinCountConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to restrict the minimum number of value nodes.

MinExclusiveConstraintComponent.label: Min-exclusive constraint component
MinExclusiveConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to restrict the range of value nodes with a minimum exclusive value.

MinInclusiveConstraintComponent.label: Min-inclusive constraint component
MinInclusiveConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to restrict the range of value nodes with a minimum inclusive value.

MinLengthConstraintComponent.label: Min-length constraint component
MinLengthConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to restrict the minimum string length of value nodes.

NodeConstraintComponent.label: Node constraint component
NodeConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to verify that all value nodes conform to the given node shape.

NodeKind.label: Node kind
NodeKind.description: The class of all node kinds, including sh:BlankNode, sh:IRI, sh:Literal or the combinations of these: sh:BlankNodeOrIRI, sh:BlankNodeOrLiteral, sh:IRIOrLiteral.

NodeKindConstraintComponent.label: Node-kind constraint component
NodeKindConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to restrict the RDF node kind of each value node.

NodeShape.label: Node shape
NodeShape.description: A node shape is a shape that specifies constraint that need to be met with respect to focus nodes.

NotConstraintComponent.label: Not constraint component
NotConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to verify that value nodes do not conform to a given shape.

OrConstraintComponent.label: Or constraint component
OrConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to restrict the value nodes so that they conform to at least one out of several provided shapes.

Parameter.label: Parameter
Parameter.description: The class of parameter declarations, consisting of a path predicate and (possibly) information about allowed value type, cardinality and other characteristics.

Parameterizable.label: Parameterizable
Parameterizable.description: Superclass of components that can take parameters, especially functions and constraint components.

PatternConstraintComponent.label: Pattern constraint component
PatternConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to verify that every value node matches a given regular expression.

PrefixDeclaration.label: Prefix declaration
PrefixDeclaration.description: The class of prefix declarations, consisting of pairs of a prefix with a namespace.

PropertyConstraintComponent.label: Property constraint component
PropertyConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to verify that all value nodes conform to the given property shape.

PropertyGroup.label: Property group
PropertyGroup.description: Instances of this class represent groups of property shapes that belong together.

PropertyShape.label: Property shape
PropertyShape.description: A property shape is a shape that specifies constraints on the values of a focus node for a given property or path.

QualifiedMaxCountConstraintComponent.label: Qualified-max-count constraint component
QualifiedMaxCountConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to verify that a specified maximum number of value nodes conforms to a given shape.

QualifiedMinCountConstraintComponent.label: Qualified-min-count constraint component
QualifiedMinCountConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to verify that a specified minimum number of value nodes conforms to a given shape.

ResultAnnotation.label: Result annotation
ResultAnnotation.description: A class of result annotations, which define the rules to derive the values of a given annotation property as extra values for a validation result.

Rule.label: Rule
Rule.description: The class of SHACL rules. Never instantiated directly.

SPARQLAskExecutable.label: SPARQL ASK executable
SPARQLAskExecutable.description: The class of SPARQL executables that are based on an ASK query.

SPARQLAskValidator.label: SPARQL ASK validator
SPARQLAskValidator.description: The class of validators based on SPARQL ASK queries. The queries are evaluated for each value node and are supposed to return true if the given node conforms.

SPARQLConstraint.label: SPARQL constraint
SPARQLConstraint.description: The class of constraints based on SPARQL SELECT queries.

SPARQLConstraintComponent.label: SPARQL constraint component
SPARQLConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to define constraints based on SPARQL queries.

SPARQLConstructExecutable.label: SPARQL CONSTRUCT executable
SPARQLConstructExecutable.description: The class of SPARQL executables that are based on a CONSTRUCT query.

SPARQLExecutable.label: SPARQL executable
SPARQLExecutable.description: The class of resources that encapsulate a SPARQL query.

SPARQLFunction.label: SPARQL function
SPARQLFunction.description: A function backed by a SPARQL query - either ASK or SELECT.

SPARQLRule.label: SPARQL CONSTRUCT rule
SPARQLRule.description: The class of SHACL rules based on SPARQL CONSTRUCT queries.

SPARQLSelectExecutable.label: SPARQL SELECT executable
SPARQLSelectExecutable.description: The class of SPARQL executables based on a SELECT query.

SPARQLSelectValidator.label: SPARQL SELECT validator
SPARQLSelectValidator.description: The class of validators based on SPARQL SELECT queries. The queries are evaluated for each focus node and are supposed to produce bindings for all focus nodes that do not conform.

SPARQLTarget.label: SPARQL target
SPARQLTarget.description: The class of targets that are based on SPARQL queries.

SPARQLTargetType.label: SPARQL target type
SPARQLTargetType.description: The (meta) class for parameterizable targets that are based on SPARQL queries.

SPARQLUpdateExecutable.label: SPARQL UPDATE executable
SPARQLUpdateExecutable.description: The class of SPARQL executables based on a SPARQL UPDATE.

Severity.label: Severity
Severity.description: The class of validation result severity levels, including violation and warning levels.

Shape.label: Shape
Shape.description: A shape is a collection of constraints that may be targeted for certain nodes.

Target.label: Target
Target.description: The base class of targets such as those based on SPARQL queries.

TargetType.label: Target type
TargetType.description: The (meta) class for parameterizable targets.	Instances of this are instantiated as values of the sh:target property.

TripleRule.label: A rule based on triple (subject, predicate, object) pattern.

UniqueLangConstraintComponent.label: Unique-languages constraint component
UniqueLangConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to specify that no pair of value nodes may use the same language tag.

ValidationReport.label: Validation report
ValidationReport.description: The class of SHACL validation reports.

Validator.label: Validator
Validator.description: The class of validators, which provide instructions on how to process a constraint definition. This class serves as base class for the SPARQL-based validators and other possible implementations.

Violation.label: Violation
Violation.description: The severity for a violation validation result.

Warning.label: Warning
Warning.description: The severity for a warning validation result.

XoneConstraintComponent.label: Exactly one constraint component
XoneConstraintComponent.description: A constraint component that can be used to restrict the value nodes so that they conform to exactly one out of several provided shapes.

alternativePath.label: alternative path
alternativePath.description: The (single) value of this property must be a list of path elements, representing the elements of alternative paths.

and.label: and
and.description: RDF list of shapes to validate the value nodes against.

annotationProperty.label: annotation property
annotationProperty.description: The annotation property that shall be set.

annotationValue.label: annotation value
annotationValue.description: The (default) values of the annotation property.

annotationVarName.label: annotation variable name
annotationVarName.description: The name of the SPARQL variable from the SELECT clause that shall be used for the values.

ask.label: ask
ask.description: The SPARQL ASK query to execute.

class.label: class
class.description: The type that all value nodes must have.

closed.label: closed
closed.description: If set to true then the shape is closed.

condition.label: condition
condition.description: The shapes that the focus nodes need to conform to before a rule is executed on them.

conforms.label: conforms
conforms.description: True if the validation did not produce any validation results, and false otherwise.

construct.label: construct
construct.description: The SPARQL CONSTRUCT query to execute.

datatype.label: datatype
datatype.description: Specifies an RDF datatype that all value nodes must have.

deactivated.label: deactivated
deactivated.description: If set to true then all nodes conform to this.

declare.label: declare
declare.description: Links a resource with its namespace prefix declarations.

defaultValue.label: default value
defaultValue.description: A default value for a property, for example for user interface tools to pre-populate input fields.

description.label: description
description.description: Human-readable descriptions for the property in the context of the surrounding shape.

detail.label: detail
detail.description: Links a result with other results that provide more details, for example to describe violations against nested shapes.

disjoint.label: disjoint
disjoint.description: Specifies a property where the set of values must be disjoint with the value nodes.

entailment.label: entailment
entailment.description: An entailment regime that indicates what kind of inferencing is required by a shapes graph.

equals.label: equals
equals.description: Specifies a property that must have the same values as the value nodes.

expression.label: expression
expression.description: The node expression that must return true for the value nodes.

filterShape.label: filter shape
filterShape.description: The shape that all input nodes of the expression need to conform to.

flags.label: flags
flags.description: An optional flag to be used with regular expression pattern matching.

focusNode.label: focus node
focusNode.description: The focus node that was validated when the result was produced.

group.label: group
group.description: Can be used to link to a property group to indicate that a property shape belongs to a group of related property shapes.

hasValue.label: has value
hasValue.description: Specifies a value that must be among the value nodes.

ignoredProperties.label: ignored properties
ignoredProperties.description: An optional RDF list of properties that are also permitted in addition to those explicitly enumerated via sh:property/sh:path.

in.label: in
in.description: Specifies a list of allowed values so that each value node must be among the members of the given list.

intersection.label: intersection
intersection.description: A list of node expressions that shall be intersected.

inversePath.label: inverse path
inversePath.description: The (single) value of this property represents an inverse path (object to subject).

jsFunctionName.label: JavaScript function name
jsFunctionName.description: The name of the JavaScript function to execute.

jsLibrary.label: JavaScript library
jsLibrary.description: Declares which JavaScript libraries are needed to execute this.

jsLibraryURL.label: JavaScript library URL
jsLibraryURL.description: Declares the URLs of a JavaScript library. This should be the absolute URL of a JavaScript file. Implementations may redirect those to local files.

labelTemplate.label: label template
labelTemplate.description: Outlines how human-readable labels of instances of the associated Parameterizable shall be produced. The values can contain {?paramName} as placeholders for the actual values of the given parameter.

languageIn.label: language in
languageIn.description: Specifies a list of language tags that all value nodes must have.

lessThan.label: less than
lessThan.description: Specifies a property that must have smaller values than the value nodes.

lessThanOrEquals.label: less than or equals
lessThanOrEquals.description: Specifies a property that must have smaller or equal values than the value nodes.

maxCount.label: max count
maxCount.description: Specifies the maximum number of values in the set of value nodes.

maxExclusive.label: max exclusive
maxExclusive.description: Specifies the maximum exclusive value of each value node.

maxInclusive.label: max inclusive
maxInclusive.description: Specifies the maximum inclusive value of each value node.

maxLength.label: max length
maxLength.description: Specifies the maximum string length of each value node.

message.label: message
message.description: A human-readable message (possibly with placeholders for variables) explaining the cause of the result.

minCount.label: min count
minCount.description: Specifies the minimum number of values in the set of value nodes.

minExclusive.label: min exclusive
minExclusive.description: Specifies the minimum exclusive value of each value node.

minInclusive.label: min inclusive
minInclusive.description: Specifies the minimum inclusive value of each value node.

minLength.label: min length
minLength.description: Specifies the minimum string length of each value node.

name.label: name
name.description: Human-readable labels for the property in the context of the surrounding shape.

namespace.label: namespace
namespace.description: The namespace associated with a prefix in a prefix declaration.

node.label: node
node.description: Specifies the node shape that all value nodes must conform to.

nodeKind.label: node kind
nodeKind.description: Specifies the node kind (e.g. IRI or literal) each value node.

nodeValidator.label: shape validator
nodeValidator.description: The validator(s) used to evaluate a constraint in the context of a node shape.

nodes.label: nodes
nodes.description: The node expression producing the input nodes of a filter shape expression.

not.label: not
not.description: Specifies a shape that the value nodes must not conform to.

object.label: object
object.description: An expression producing the nodes that shall be inferred as objects.

oneOrMorePath.label: one or more path
oneOrMorePath.description: The (single) value of this property represents a path that is matched one or more times.

optional.label: optional
optional.description: Indicates whether a parameter is optional.

or.label: or
or.description: Specifies a list of shapes so that the value nodes must conform to at least one of the shapes.

order.label: order
order.description: Specifies the relative order of this compared to its siblings. For example use 0 for the first, 1 for the second.

parameter.label: parameter
parameter.description: The parameters of a function or constraint component.

path.label: path
path.description: Specifies the property path of a property shape.

pattern.label: pattern
pattern.description: Specifies a regular expression pattern that the string representations of the value nodes must match.

predicate.label: predicate
predicate.description: An expression producing the properties that shall be inferred as predicates.

prefix.label: prefix
prefix.description: The prefix of a prefix declaration.

prefixes.label: prefixes
prefixes.description: The prefixes that shall be applied before parsing the associated SPARQL query.

property.label: property
property.description: Links a shape to its property shapes.

propertyValidator.label: property validator
propertyValidator.description: The validator(s) used to evaluate a constraint in the context of a property shape.

qualifiedMaxCount.label: qualified max count
qualifiedMaxCount.description: The maximum number of value nodes that can conform to the shape.

qualifiedMinCount.label: qualified min count
qualifiedMinCount.description: The minimum number of value nodes that must conform to the shape.

qualifiedValueShape.label: qualified value shape
qualifiedValueShape.description: The shape that a specified number of values must conform to.

qualifiedValueShapesDisjoint.label: qualified value shapes disjoint
qualifiedValueShapesDisjoint.description: Can be used to mark the qualified value shape to be disjoint with its sibling shapes.

result.label: result
result.description: The validation results contained in a validation report.

resultAnnotation.label: result annotation
resultAnnotation.description: Links a SPARQL validator with zero or more sh:ResultAnnotation instances, defining how to derive additional result properties based on the variables of the SELECT query.

resultMessage.label: result message
resultMessage.description: Human-readable messages explaining the cause of the result.

resultPath.label: result path
resultPath.description: The path of a validation result, based on the path of the validated property shape.

resultSeverity.label: result severity
resultSeverity.description: The severity of the result, e.g. warning.

returnType.label: return type
returnType.description: The expected type of values returned by the associated function.

rule.label: rule
rule.description: The rules linked to a shape.

select.label: select
select.description: The SPARQL SELECT query to execute.

severity.label: severity
severity.description: Defines the severity that validation results produced by a shape must have. Defaults to sh:Violation.

shapesGraph.label: shapes graph
shapesGraph.description: Shapes graphs that should be used when validating this data graph.

shapesGraphWellFormed.label: shapes graph well-formed
shapesGraphWellFormed.description: If true then the validation engine was certain that the shapes graph has passed all SHACL syntax requirements during the validation process.

sourceConstraint.label: source constraint
sourceConstraint.description: The constraint that was validated when the result was produced.

sourceConstraintComponent.label: source constraint component
sourceConstraintComponent.description: The constraint component that is the source of the result.

sourceShape.label: source shape
sourceShape.description: The shape that is was validated when the result was produced.

sparql.label: constraint (in SPARQL)
sparql.description: Links a shape with SPARQL constraints.

subject.label: subject
subject.description: An expression producing the resources that shall be inferred as subjects.

suggestedShapesGraph.label: suggested shapes graph
suggestedShapesGraph.description: Suggested shapes graphs for this ontology. The values of this property may be used in the absence of specific sh:shapesGraph statements.

target.label: target
target.description: Links a shape to a target specified by an extension language, for example instances of sh:SPARQLTarget.

targetClass.label: target class
targetClass.description: Links a shape to a class, indicating that all instances of the class must conform to the shape.

targetNode.label: target node
targetNode.description: Links a shape to individual nodes, indicating that these nodes must conform to the shape.

targetObjectsOf.label: target objects of
targetObjectsOf.description: Links a shape to a property, indicating that all all objects of triples that have the given property as their predicate must conform to the shape.

targetSubjectsOf.label: target subjects of
targetSubjectsOf.description: Links a shape to a property, indicating that all subjects of triples that have the given property as their predicate must conform to the shape.

this.label: this
this.description: A node expression that represents the current focus node.

union.label: union
union.description: A list of node expressions that shall be used together.

uniqueLang.label: unique languages
uniqueLang.description: Specifies whether all node values must have a unique (or no) language tag.

validator.label: validator
validator.description: The validator(s) used to evaluate constraints of either node or property shapes.

value.label: value
value.description: An RDF node that has caused the result.

xone.label: exactly one
xone.description: Specifies a list of shapes so that the value nodes must conform to exactly one of the shapes.

zeroOrMorePath.label: zero or more path
zeroOrMorePath.description: The (single) value of this property represents a path that is matched zero or more times.

zeroOrOnePath.label: zero or one path
zeroOrOnePath.description: The (single) value of this property represents a path that is matched zero or one times.
